participant_1.name: George
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and introspective, George enjoys the tranquility of nature and finding joy in simple pleasures.
participant_1.background: i am a bee farmer. i have zero family that i'm close to. my name is george. my favorite food is papaya.

participant_2.name: Lily
participant_2.personality: Cheerful and nurturing, Lily finds happiness in her pets and appreciates the little moments in life.
participant_2.background: i love taking bubble baths. i'm single and with two dogs. i do not drink alcohol. i'm in my thirties.
